results.content: Carefully, step by step, takes one to a high level of knowledge. Not for the absolute novice, but even a small level of exposure will set the stage for this course. And even the novice can come up to speed.

results.content:
Lot of detail here. Takes me back to DOS prior to modern windows like user interface. If this quality, depth and clear explanation continues, I'll be a happy camper. :-) 

I would like an equally detailed course on the download version of MAMP using Word Press as a training exeercise. Building my own server just might be a tad above my pay grade. :-)

results.content: This is a pretty good course, very very good in fact, unfortunately it is too old for our days since MySQL has changed ver very much since this course was created. It's like disarming a car and, when reassembling it, an important piece was left unarmed and you can no longer use the car.

results.content: Very informative. There was only one section that's missing information and that's lecture on how to modify the vhosts.conf file.
results.content_html: Very informative. There was only one section that's missing information and that's lecture on how to modify the vhosts.conf file.

results.content:
disappointing the picture of the elephant led me to believe it had something to do with www.mamp.info/ site and software which its not.
fortunately when searching for a coupon for mamp pro i discovered its abandonware/no updates or help which led me to ampps this is the way to go.
tryed to ask the tutor a question before i bought this course/no answer as it would have saved me from purchasing it.
a bit below the belt im afraid-wouldnt trust them to ever buy another course from infinite tricks
